meanings.definition: An action performed without conscious thought as a response to a stimulus.
meanings.sent1: When the doctor hit my knee with a hammer, my leg kicked out in a reflex.
meanings.sent2: She quickly caught the falling glass in a reflex, without even thinking.
meanings.sent3: The cat's reflex to a sudden noise was to jump straight up in the air!
meanings.sent4: His reflex to protect his sister was as quick as lightning.
meanings.sent5: The reflex of blinking when something comes too close to your eye is automatic.

meanings.definition: To react in response to a situation or stimulus.
